title: Ticket #2696: Funny-looking, half-written userlog XML record
description:
We had the disk fill up last night on a submit host, and I got a funny-looking, half-written record (which, by the way, crashes globus... but that's another issue).

The last part of the record looks like this: 

<c>
    <a n="MyType">ShadowExceptionEvent
    <a n="Cluster">125778
    <a n="EventTypeNumber">7
    <a n="Message">dprintf hit fatal errors

    <a n="ReceivedBytes"><r>4.289600000000000E+04</r>
    <a n="EventTime">2011-12-07T03:19:56
    <a n="SentBytes"><r>0.000000000000000E+00</r>
    <a n="Proc">0
    <a n="S

Notice the "message" includes an extra newline character. That shouldn't be there, I think - doesn't match the style of the rest of the log messages.

I don't think there's much that can be done about the half-written record, unfortunately.
creator: bbockelm
